name: Little Foot
description:
Looking for Completion in an Incomplete World...

Join Little Foot on the Search for the Lost Body!

You Will Find the Dreaming Girl and Be United At Last

  • Arrows to Move
  • ASD to Ask/Take/Give
    • If you Give while Moving, you kick it!
  • Esc to skip Intro (twice if in Full Screen mode)
  • Tab for Silent Speed Mode

Meet Characters and Make Friends!

  • Ducky
  • Rock
  • Oregano
  • PatchOfGrass
  • Gardener
  • PottedOregano
  • Squirrel
  • BearDog
  • Beaver
  • Your Sweet Twin
  • Dreaming Girl
  • ...and many more!

(That was kind of a hint right there...you know...the order of things?  Heh)

Please let us know if you find the Dreaming Girl, and along the way:

Listen to Beautiful Music

See the Amazing Artwork

Explore the World Then and Now

Enjoy the Unfinished Dance of Source Code

If you want to join Us 

In creating the next Adventure 

For Godot Wild Jam

Join us on Discord at Falling Fruit

Thanks so much to everyone who Asked and Took and Gave

  • imagine1st#0033 - Graphics
  • Lucas#7528 - Music
  • Snil4#1467 - Sound FX
  • ... & timeeeee#0113 - Programming Inspiration

:-)

Thanks to Their Temple for hosting the Demo

Blessings to the Gods in All Their Forms!

...even Acorn
